title: The Entertainer
creator_credit: Donald Wrye, Marvin Hamlisch, Beryl Vertue, Persky-Bright Productions and Robert Stigwood Organisation
brief_description: Coping with constant failures, down and almost out comedian Archie Rice (jack Lemmon) lives with his family and his famous retired father Billy (Ray Bolger). He dreams of the day he will be a star. Cast also includes Sada thompson, Tyne Daly, Michael Cristofer. From the play by John Osborne with music by Marvin Hamlisch.
